tasks.name: Localizer Task
tasks.definition: Participants viewed blocks of images from different categories (faces, flowers, bodies, scenes) interleaved with fixation blocks. They were required to either watch the stimuli or make specific judgments (e.g., male/female, indoor/outdoor) depending on the dataset.

tasks.name: Resting State
tasks.definition: Participants were instructed to fixate on a central point while resting scans were collected. The goal was to examine intrinsic functional connectivity without external stimulation.
